ygData.subject: Hung process when building job?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am experiencing a situation that I m having trouble resolving, and I am wondering if any of you have encountered it before.  Basically, I am

--_000_C2A9ED4EEB729F4AA37305B18F725AC27DB846D588LCXCLMB03LCDS_
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hello all,


I am experiencing a situation that I'm having trouble resolvin=
g, and I am wondering if any of you have encountered it before.  Basically,=
 I am working with two different VM environments right now, and I am simply=
 downloading / unpacking the distribution tars from here<http://builds.arch=
ive.org/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.3.0-SNAPSHOT/>, then running=
 the application with no real configuration manipulation uaing:


         =
         $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix -p 8085 -b / -a <user>:<password>


In=
 one of the environments, I have installed and successfully run Heritrix 3.=
0, 3.1, 3.2, and 3.3 with no issues.  In the other environment, I am able t=
o run all versions of the application, but I am experiencing the same issue=
 with each version whereby I cannot build a job.  I can successfully create=
 the new job ('test_job'), but when I click the job and then click 'build',=
 the browsers just endlessly loads.  The job.log.lck file is created on the=
 backend, but no job.log.


When I monitor the traffic on the VM that works=
, after clicking 'build', I see that a POST request is made to 'test_job', =
which returns a 303 and is followed up by a successful 200 GET request to t=
he same 'test_job' path (along with successful 200 requests for all of the =
pertinent css and js files).  When I monitor the traffic on the problematic=
 VM, however, I see that the initial POST request is made, but never resolv=
es.  It simply hangs until I halt the request through my browser.  If I cli=
ck 'build' again after halting the request, it jumps immediately to 'Job is=
 Finished' without writing anything to an associated job.log file.  This se=
cond 'build' execution runs the expected POST request, which returns 303 an=
d is followed by a successful 200 GET request; however, the css and js file=
s are not requested.


I have checked the permissions on the file system mu=
ltiple times to ensure that they are correct, which they seem to be (as evi=
denced by that fact that the jobs/test_job/crawler-beans.cxml  and the jobs=
/test_job/job.log.lck are successfully written).  I am sure that this is an=
 environment issue and not a Heritrix issue, but I am at a bit of a loss as=
 to why the POST request is hanging initially.  I have increased the loggin=
g in conf/logging.properties, but there weren't any red flag clues there, a=
s far as I can tell.


One other detail I've notice is that, on the offendi=
ng VM, when I click off to the job page from the engine page, I see only on=
e request made (for 'test_job').  In other words, the css/js is not loaded.=
  When I refresh the page, I notice that all of the resources (including js=
/css) are loaded.  Might I be missing some dependency?  I've tested all of =
the above on java 1.6 JRE/JDK and java 1.7 JRE.


We have successfully depl=
oyed/tested various Heritrix 3.0+ version on both Ubuntu and RedHat servers=
/VMs.  The offending VM is running 64bit RedHat.


Thanks,
Phil


Philip Ar=
dery / OSI Web Archiving - IT Specialist [LA-314]
202-707-3940 / pard@loc.g=
ov<mailto:pard@...>
